titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, January 29, 1963

mods.tableOfContents: Riverside Indian Club. Mr. and Mrs. Lucius Ahhaitty. Georgia Christian. Announcements by Clyde Warrior. History of Riverside by Mrs. Lucius Ahhaitty. Beginning Songs: James Sampson club president. Competition dance songs: Navajo group of 7. Squaw Dance songs: Navajo group of 7.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
